name: Highway Moto Bike Rider
description:
Highway Moto Bike Rider is the most realistic bike driving game 3D of traffic highway racing in car. Get behind wheels and enjoy the best realistic experience of real moto racing through the endless traffic and realistic environment.

Features:
- Realistic Moto driving
- First person rider camera view
- Smooth & easy mobile gameplay
- Multiplayer riding mode
- Realistic traffic systems
- Various tracks and scenario to play
